DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determinate the effects of percutaneous electrical nerve stimulation in the short-term for pain in patients with myofascial chronic neck pain.
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Effects of Dry Needling and Tens in Chronic Neck Pain
DOC.criteria: Neck pain for more than six months of evolution. Active Myofascial Trigger Point number 2 on Trapezius muscle. Score of more than 2 points in a Visual Analog Scale. Neck pain specific. Radiculopathies. Whiplash. Dizziness and migraines Cervical surgical intervention Previous treatment of Dry Needling
